gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 116, Grizzlies 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Grizzlies, 116-110. Bennedict Mathurin led the way for the Pacers with 24 points (3-5 3PT FG) and seven rebounds, while Jalen Smith added 19 points (8-13 FG) and 10 rebounds in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 25 points, five rebounds and four assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Pacers win their third straight game as they improve to 27-20 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-28.
